targets.deepseek-v3.2: The north wind cut like a knife, and frost covered the ground.
targets.qwen3-max: The north wind cuts like a knife; ice and frost cover the ground.

source: 江南近海滨的一条大路上，一队清兵手执刀枪，押着七辆囚车，冲风冒寒，向北而行。

targets.human: Along a coastal road somewhere south of the Yangtze River, a detachment of soldiers, each of them armed with a halberd, was escorting a line of seven prison carts, trudging northwards in the teeth of a bitter wind.
targets.deepseek-v3.2: Along a broad road near the coast south of the Yangtze River, a troop of Qing soldiers, armed with swords and spears, escorted seven prison carts northward, braving the biting wind and cold.
targets.qwen3-max: On a major road near the coast in Jiangnan, a squad of Qing soldiers, armed with swords and spears, escorted seven prison carts northward through biting wind and bitter cold.

source: 前面三辆囚车中分别监禁的是三个男子，都作书生打扮，一个是白发老者，两个是中年人。

targets.human: In each of the first three carts a single male prisoner was caged, identifiable by his dress as a member of the scholar class. One was a white-haired old man. The other two were men of middle years.
targets.deepseek-v3.2: In the first three prison carts were confined three men, all dressed as scholars—one was an elderly man with white hair, and the other two were middle-aged.
targets.qwen3-max: The three men imprisoned in the first three prison carts were all dressed as scholars—one was an elderly man with white hair, and the other two were middle-aged.

source: 后面四辆囚车中坐的是女子，最后一辆囚车中是个少妇，怀中抱着个女婴。

targets.human: The four rear carts were occupied by women, the last of them by a young mother holding a baby girl at her breast.
targets.deepseek-v3.2: The four prison carts behind carried women, and in the very last cart sat a young woman holding an infant girl in her arms.
targets.qwen3-max: The four carts behind carried women, and in the last cart sat a young woman cradling a baby girl in her arms.

source: 女婴啼哭不休。 她母亲温言相呵，女婴只是大哭。

targets.human: The little girl was crying in a continuous wail which her mother's gentle words of comfort were powerless to console.
targets.deepseek-v3.2: The baby girl cried incessantly. Her mother soothed her with gentle words, but the infant only wailed louder.
targets.qwen3-max: The baby girl cried incessantly. Her mother gently scolded her, but the infant only wailed louder.

source: 囚车旁一清兵恼了，伸腿在车上踢了一脚，喝道：“再哭，再哭！

targets.human: One of the soldiers marching alongside, irritated by the baby's crying, aimed a mighty kick at the cart. 'Stop it! Shut up!
targets.deepseek-v3.2: A Qing soldier by the prison cart grew annoyed. He kicked the cart with his leg and shouted, "Stop crying! Stop crying, or else!"
targets.qwen3-max: An angry Qing soldier standing beside the prisoner cart kicked it with his leg and shouted, "Stop crying! Stop crying!"

targets.human: Or I'll really give you something to cry about!'

source: 那女婴一惊，哭得更加响了。

targets.human: The baby, startled by this sudden violence, cried even louder.
targets.deepseek-v3.2: The baby girl, startled, cried even louder.
targets.qwen3-max: The baby girl startled and cried even louder.

source: 离开道路数十丈处有座大屋，屋檐下站着一个中年文士，一个十一二岁的小孩。

targets.human: Under the eaves of a large house, some hundred yards from the road, a middle-aged scholar was standing with a ten- or eleven-year-old boy at his side.
targets.deepseek-v3.2: Several dozen yards from the road stood a large house. Under its eaves stood a middle-aged scholar and a child of about eleven or twelve.
targets.qwen3-max: Dozens of zhang away from the road stood a large house, beneath whose eaves stood a middle-aged scholar and a boy about eleven or twelve years old.

source: 那文士见到这等情景，不禁长叹一声，眼眶也红了，说道：“可怜，可怜！”

targets.human: He was evidently affected by this little scene, for a groan escaped his lips and he appeared to be very close to tears. 'Poor creatures!' he murmured to himself.
targets.deepseek-v3.2: Upon witnessing this scene, the scholar could not help but let out a long sigh, his eyes reddening as he said, 'How pitiful, how pitiful!'
targets.qwen3-max: Seeing this scene, the scholar couldn't help but let out a long sigh, his eyes welling up with tears, and said, 'Poor soul, poor soul!'
